meta.description: It may seem like a “duh” moment for many, but for what could very well be the majority of people out there, the perception that any ‘negative’ information pertaining to COVID vaccines was the product of “misinformation,” “fake news,” or a “conspiracy theory” still reigns true.

title: New Emails Show Biden Administration Actively Censored "True Content" About COVID Vaccines With An Army of Federal Censors
cleaned_text:
Our use of cookies

We use necessary cookies to make our site work. We also set performance and functionality cookies that help us make improvements by measuring traffic on our site. For more detailed information about the cookies we use, please see our privacy policy

opengraph.title: New Emails Show Biden Administration Actively Censored "True Content" About COVID Vaccines With An Army of Federal Censors
opengraph.description: It may seem like a “duh” moment for many, but for what could very well be the majority of people out there, the perception that any ‘negative’ information pertaining to COVID vaccines was the product of “misinformation,” “fake news,” or a “conspiracy theory” still reigns true.
